restlib

Class ContentInfoWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.ContentInfo
      • restlib.ContentInfoWrapper

  • @Immutable
public class ContentInfoWrapper
extends ContentInfo
    An implementation of ContentInfo which forwards all its method calls to another instance of ContentInfo. Subclasses should override one or more methods to modify the behavior of the backing ContentInfo as desired per the decorator pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ContentInfoWrapper(ContentInfo delegate)
      Constructs an instance of ContentInfoWrapper that forwards all method calls to delegate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ContentEncoding> encodings()
      Returns the content-codings that have been applied to the message entity.
      Set<Language> languages()
      Returns the natural language(s) for the intended audience of the message entity.
      Optional<Long> length()
      Returns the length of the message entity, if available.
      Optional<Uri> location()
      Return a URI that can be used as a specific identifier for the message entity.
      Optional<MediaRange> mediaRange()
      Returns the media type of the message entity.
      Optional<ContentRange> range()
      Returns where in the full message entity the payload body is intended to be applied in responses to range requests.

      • Methods inherited from class restlib.ContentInfo

        builder, equals, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
